mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_INFO (PRODUCT_ID, JOIN_DATE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, MEMBER_ID, BALANCE) VALUES(#{product_id},SYSDATE, #{account_number}, #{member_id}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT PI.PRODUCT_ID , PI.JOIN_DATE , PI.ACCOUNT_NUMBER , PI.MEMBER_ID , PI.BALANCE , P.PRODUCT_TYPE , P.PRODUCT_RATE , P.PRODUCT_DETAIL FROM PRODUCT_INFO PI JOIN PRODUCT P ON PI.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID WHERE PI.ACCOUNT_NUMBER = #{account_number}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HISTORY VALUES(HISTORY_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{account_sender},SYSDATE,#{amount}, (SELECT BALANCE FROM PRODUCT_INFO WHERE ACCOUNT_NUMBER = #{account_sender})-#{amount},'O')
INSERT INTO HISTORY VALUES(HISTORY_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{account_number},SYSDATE,#{amount}, (SELECT BALANCE FROM PRODUCT_INFO WHERE ACCOUNT_NUMBER = #{account_number})+#{amount},'I')
